title: MoonRise Tokenomics
intro: MoonRise was designed with structure to ensure balance, transparency, and sustainable growth. No token was given away for free — everything was planned with purpose, strategy, and long-term vision.
distributionNote: Every fraction of the supply was allocated with purpose. No leftovers, no chance — only strategy and execution.
fundsText: All raised funds are allocated transparently and traceably. The priority is to generate value, ensure stability, and drive the growth of the ecosystem.

funds.title: MoonRise Ecosystem
funds.desc: Continuous reinvestment in infrastructure, products (Wallet, MoonSwap, Bank), and expansion. Every transaction strengthens the empire.

funds.title: Stability Reserves
funds.desc: Protection fund to maintain liquidity and support the price during high volatility and market events.

funds.title: Market Liquidity
funds.desc: Guaranteeing depth and fluid movement for healthy token trading.

funds.title: Holder Appreciation
funds.desc: Part of the profits and strategic execution return as direct and indirect benefits to loyal holders.

closing.phrase: MoonRise was built on execution, data, and long-term vision. No airdrops, no additional mint. Public transparency and auditable locks.
